title: MLB Pressbox status checks for https://www.mlbppressbox.com/
custom_preconds: Given the user establishes connection to https://www.mlbppressbox.com/ with okta-access-token
custom_steps: When the user checks for the url status response
custom_expected: Then the URL response statuts must be 200

title: MLB Pressbox status checks for https://www.mlbppressbox.com/clubAbbreviations
custom_preconds: Given the user establishes connection to https://www.mlbppressbox.com/clubAbbreviations with okta-access-token
custom_steps: When the user checks for the url status response
custom_expected: Then the URL response statuts must be 200

title: MLB Pressbox status checks for https://www.mlbppressbox.com/spring-training
custom_preconds: Given the user establishes connection to https://www.mlbppressbox.com/spring-training with okta-access-token
custom_steps: When the user checks for the url status response
custom_expected: Then the URL response statuts must be 200

title: MLB Pressbox Schedule tests
custom_preconds: Given the singed in user navigates to https://www.mlbpressbox.com/ and https://www.mlbpressbox.com/clubAbbrivations with a valid schedule
custom_expected: Then schedule must be present on the UI

title: MLB Pressbox Score Card Tests - Clubs
custom_preconds: Given the singed in user navigates to https://www.mlbpressbox.com/clubAbbrivations with a valid score card
custom_expected: Then score card must be present on the UI and \match stats API

title: MLB Pressbox Score Card Test - Portal
custom_preconds: Given the singed in user navigates to https://www.mlbpressbox.com/ with a valid score card
custom_expected: Then score card must be present on the UI and match stats API

title: MLB Pressbox Multimedia Tests - Portal
custom_preconds: Given the user navigates to https://www.mlbpressbox.com/multimedia after signing in.
custom_steps: When the user lands on the page.
custom_expected:
Then verify the page status is 200 
And also verify Aspera is initialized by checking id = "asperaIframeContainer" is displayed.

title: MLB Pressbox Multimedia Tests - Clubs
custom_preconds: Given the user navigates to https://www.mlbpressbox.com/{clubSLug}/multimedia after signing in.
custom_steps: When the user lands on the page.
custom_expected:
Then verify the page status is 200
And also verify Aspera is initialized by checking id = "asperaIframeContainer" is displayed.

title: MLB Pressbox Mini Scoreboard Tests - Portal
custom_preconds: Given when the API says that scoreboard must be displayed for pressbox portal page
custom_steps: When the user lands on the pressbox portal page
custom_expected: Then the user must see the mini scoreboard on pressbox portal page
